org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.devices

Class DeviceSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.devices.DeviceSettings
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OathDeviceSettings, PushDeviceSettings

    public abstract class DeviceSettings
extends Object
    Abstract concept of DeviceSettings, used to ensure that any device(s) stored have a unique identifier so that they can be individually referenced. Despite this, most interactions will be with the entire field rather than specific instances of devices as multiple individual devices per user per realm is currently not directly supported.
